mapper.select: select c.id,c.name,c.phone,c.borndate,company,position,source,status,status_name,notes,sdr_status,sdr_status_name, sdr_notes,assignee_id,e1.name,creator_id,e2.name,last_follow_up_time,c.create_time,c.update_time from customers c left join status s on c.status = s.status_id left join sdr_status ss on c.sdr_status = ss.sdr_status_id left join employees e1 on c.assignee_id = e1.id left join employees e2 on c.creator_id = e2.id

mapper.update: UPDATE customers SET status = #{status} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT phone FROM CUSTOMERS WHERE phone=#{phone}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO customers (name, phone, borndate, company, position, source, status, assignee_id,creator_id) VALUES (#{name}, #{phone}, #{borndate}, #{company}, #{position}, #{source},#{status},#{assigneeId},#{creatorId});
